short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: A userscript manager that supports major browsers

short.el: Προσφέρει υποστήριξη για σενάρια χρηστών για τους φυλλομετρητές.
short.es_419: Un administrador de userscripts de código abierto que admite muchos navegadores
short.fr: Un gestionnaire de scipts utilisateurs qui supporte beaucoup de navigateurs
short.hr: Omogućava korištenje korisničkih skripti u web pregledniku.
short.id: Pengelola userscript sumber terbuka yang mendukung banyak peramban
short.it: An open source userscript manager that supports a lot of browsers
short.ja: 多くのブラウザをサポートする、オープンソースの UserScript マネージャー

short.ru: Steel Monkey - менеджер пользовательских скриптов для множества браузеров, с открытым исходным кодом.

short.vi: Hỗ trợ chạy userscript trên trình duyệt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An open-source userscript manager with a rich browser support.

Steel Monkey enables userscript support in browsers that run WebExtensions. It works with most scripts for Greasemonkey and Tampermonkey.

Features:
Automatic updates based on the metadata
Script execution according to the order of the list
Supports GM functions
Supports both importing from and exporting to zip files
Integration with Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, and WebDAV
